source:
# Check for new, updated or deleted data
- This script checks for new, updated or deleted data by checking the source data (timesheets) against the target (odw_harmonised_db.timesheets_segment_type_reference)
- **New Data:** where a table in the source does not exist as an tableCode in the target. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Updated data:** Comparison occurs on table in source and tableCode in targtableet where the row hash is different i.e. there is a change in one of the columns. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Deleted data:** where an tableCode in the target exists but the same Disability_Text doesn't exist in the source. DeletedData flag is set to 'Y'

## View timesheets_segment_type_reference_new is created

%%sql
-- Build table_dim table
-- Gets modified or deleted from source rows

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW timesheets_segment_type_reference_new

    AS

-- gets data that matches of SourceID and flags that it is modified based on a row (md5) hash. Flags as "NewData"
-- gets data that is in the target but not in source. Flags as "DeletedData"

SELECT
    CASE
        WHEN T1.segment_type_id IS NULL
        THEN T3.SegmentTypeID
    END as SegmentTypeReferenceID, -- surrogate key
    T1.segment_type_id AS SegmentTypeID,
    T1.segment_type_description AS SegmentTypeDescription,
    T1.segment_type_shortname AS SegmentTypeShortName,
    T1.segment_type_validity AS SegmentTypeValidity,
    T1.future_selectable AS FutureSelectable,
    T2.SourceSystemID,
    to_timestamp(T1.expected_from) AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo,
    md5(concat( IFNULL(T1.segment_type_id,'.'), IFNULL(T1.segment_type_description,'.'), IFNULL(T1.segment_type_shortname,'.'), IFNULL(T1.segment_type_validity,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.future_selectable,'.'))) AS RowID,
    'Y' as IsActive, 
    T3.IsActive as HistoricIsActive

FROM odw_standardised_db.timesheets_segment_type_reference T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "Timesheets" = T2.Description and T2.IsActive = 'Y'
FULL JOIN odw_harmonised_db.timesheets_segment_type_reference_dim T3 ON T1.segment_type_id = T3.SegmentTypeID AND T3.IsActive = 'Y'

WHERE
        -- flags new data        
        ( CASE
            WHEN T1.segment_type_id = T3.SegmentTypeID AND md5(concat( IFNULL(T1.segment_type_id,'.'), IFNULL(T1.segment_type_description,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.segment_type_shortname,'.'), IFNULL(T1.segment_type_validity,'.'), IFNULL(T1.future_selectable,'.')))<> T3.RowID     
            THEN 'Y'
            WHEN T3.SegmentTypeID IS NULL
            THEN 'Y'
            ELSE 'N'
        END  = 'Y' )

    AND T1.segment_type_id IS NOT NULL
    AND T1.expected_from = (SELECT MAX(expected_from) FROM odw_standardised_db.timesheets_segment_type_reference);

# Dataset is created that contains changed data and corresponding target data
- This script combines data that has been updated, Deleted or is new, with corresponding target data
- View **table_dim_new** is unioned to the target data filter to only those rows where changes have been detected
## View table_dim_changed_rows is created

%%sql
-- Create new and updated dataset

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW timesheets_segment_type_reference_changed_rows

    AS

-- gets updated, deleted and new rows 

Select 
    SegmentTypeReferenceID,
    SegmentTypeID,
    SegmentTypeDescription,
    SegmentTypeShortName,
    SegmentTypeValidity,
    FutureSelectable,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
From timesheets_segment_type_reference_new WHERE HistoricIsActive = 'Y' or HistoricIsActive IS NULL

    UNION ALL

-- gets original versions of updated rows so we can update EndDate and set IsActive flag to 'N'

SELECT
    SegmentTypeReferenceID,
    SegmentTypeID,
    SegmentTypeDescription,
    SegmentTypeShortName,
    SegmentTypeValidity,
    FutureSelectable,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.timesheets_segment_type_reference_dim
WHERE SegmentTypeID IN (SELECT SegmentTypeID FROM timesheets_segment_type_reference_new WHERE SegmentTypeReferenceID IS NULL) 
AND IsActive = 'Y';
## Cell to calculate ValidTo date for changed registers

# View table_dim_changed_rows is used in a merge (Upsert) statement into the target table
- **WHEN MATCHED** ON the Business Key (i.e. table from Personal Characteristics), EndDate is set to today -1 day and the IsActive flag is set to 'N'
- **WHEN NOT MATCHED** ON the business key, insert rows
## Table odw_harmonised.table_dim is updated

%%sql

-- merge into target table

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.timesheets_segment_type_reference_dim AS Target
USING timesheets_segment_type_reference_changed_rows AS Source

ON Source.SegmentTypeReferenceID = Target.SegmentTypeReferenceID

-- For Updates existing rows

WHEN MATCHED
    THEN 
    UPDATE SET
    Target.ValidTo = to_timestamp(date_sub(Source.IngestionDate,1)),
    Target.IsActive = 'N'
        
-- Insert completely new rows
WHEN NOT MATCHED 
    THEN INSERT * ;

# Fix the IDs
- No auto-increment feature is available in delta tables, therefore we need to create new IDs for the inserted rows
- This is done by select the target data and using INSERT OVERWRITE to re-insert the data is a new Row Number
## Table odw_harmonised.table_dim is updated

%%sql
-- Insert new SegmentTypeReferenceID

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.timesheets_segment_type_reference_dim

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY SegmentTypeReferenceID NULLS LAST) AS SegmentTypeReferenceID,
    SegmentTypeID,
    SegmentTypeDescription,
    SegmentTypeShortName,
    SegmentTypeValidity,
    FutureSelectable,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.timesheets_segment_type_reference_dim;
